channel.description: Booleans a = True b = False print(a) print(type(b)) Booleans a = True b = False print(a) print(type(b)) True <class 'bool'> Conversion a = bool("True") False, 0, None or 0 length : False Any other value : true Conversion print(bool("True")) print(bool("False")) Conversion print(bool("True")) print(bool("False")) True True Conversion print(bool(0)) print(bool(1)) print(bool("")) Conversion print(bool(0)) print(bool(1)) print(bool("")) False True False
